General.Name: CCP Contact Probe Co Ltd
General.Description: C.C.P. Contact Probes Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design and manufacture of spring-loaded probes and connectors in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides testing solutions, including high-frequency testing, Kelvin contact testing, memory testing, burn-in testing, fine pitch connector testing, IC and ICT test probes, ATE connecting, general final testing, panel testing, wafer-level testing, battery probes, and high current IC testing solutions. It also offers pogo pin connectors, such as standard and non-standard, single pogo pin, waterproof, ballpoint, magnetic, high current and frequency, and ultra-small pin connectors, as well as screw pins; female and industrial connectors; and DAC network cables. The company was formerly known as CCP Contact Probes Enterprise Co., Ltd. and changed its name to C.C.P. Contact Probes Co., Ltd. in 1998. C.C.P. Contact Probes Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 8, Lane 24, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 220
